p: The function pool() can be used to merge several groups into one, and the function cumulate() will turn incidence data into cumulative incidence. To maximize interoperability, incidence objects can also be exported to either a matrix using get_counts() or a data.frame using as.data.frame(), including an option for a ‘long’ format which is readily compatible with ggplot2 ( Wickham, 2016) for further customization of graphics.
